typeSystemDescription.name: DiagnosisBaseSubSubsectionAnnotation
typeSystemDescription.description: Used as base class for annotations that are to be processed within a diagnosis annotation's subsections. In other words, if a diagnosis has been written in the style where each specific element is broken out by subsubsection (e.g., "Histologic Grade:", "Lymph Nodes:"), those subsubsection annotations should inherit from this base class.
